name: RMD-MP
savepath: This is an official hotfix update, that fixes all the currently reported issues regarding Terror Zones, drops, etc. In addition, Terror Zones themselves have been expanded upon, and will now also grant monster additional stats, randomly chosen each rotation. Rotations themselves have been simplified and made into larger groups. Enjoy the new changes!

The Sunder Mechanic and Terror Zones are now available via D2RHUD 1.1.2+. This will enable re-created features that mimic the official implementation, but with some slight upgrades and more planned improvements in the future. Please visit our discord for more details about how the systems work and info you might need as a mod author.
